trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZF202_03483_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Korille is at her wit's end.
TEXT_LUCKZF202_03483_TODO_00<tab>Express your /doubt to the hardheaded Viis.
TEXT_LUCKZF202_03483_TODO_01<tab>Defeat the Children of the Everlasting Dark.
TEXT_LUCKZF202_03483_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the hardheaded Viis.
TEXT_LUCKZF202_03483_KORILLE_000_000<tab>I am searching for a friend. She is yea high, sandy colored hair─have you seen her?
TEXT_LUCKZF202_03483_KORILLE_000_001<tab>...No? <sigh> Then I suppose she is off getting herself in trouble.

TEXT_LUCKZF202_03483_KORILLE_000_002<tab>She is obsessed with learning all she can of Ronka's history, you see, and has been planning to infiltrate Woven Oath to see the murals there. I told her not to go but she refuses to listen.

TEXT_LUCKZF202_03483_KORILLE_000_003<tab>If you were to express your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>doubt<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> of her schemes, perhaps she can be persuaded to return.
TEXT_LUCKZF202_03483_KORILLE_000_004<tab>Please, you have to find her before it is too late.
TEXT_LUCKZF202_03483_KORILLE_000_005<tab>I know she means well, but this time she has gone too far.
TEXT_LUCKZF202_03483_WOVENOATHKORILLE_000_010<tab>Quiet! What do you want?
TEXT_LUCKZF202_03483_WOVENOATHKORILLE_000_011<tab>Korille sent you to bring me home?
TEXT_LUCKZF202_03483_WOVENOATHKORILLE_000_012<tab>But I am so close! I cannot─will not─go back!
TEXT_LUCKZF202_03483_WOVENOATHKORILLE_000_013<tab>The murals may have knowledge that can help my people. Help <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>. It would be foolish not to try.
TEXT_LUCKZF202_03483_WOVENOATHKORILLE_000_014<tab>And now is the perfect time. They seem off balance today. As if intruders had already...come... It was you.
TEXT_LUCKZF202_03483_WOVENOATHKORILLE_000_015<tab>Then you should know better than anyone that my plan will work. If you can draw the attention of even three of their guards, that is all I need.
TEXT_LUCKZF202_03483_WOVENOATHKORILLE_000_016<tab>If all goes as planned, I will see you back at Fanow.
TEXT_LUCKZF202_03483_WOVENOATHKORILLE_000_017<tab>...

TEXT_LUCKZF202_03483_SYSTEM_000_018<tab>She seems preoccupied with something in the distance. Perhaps expressing your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>doubts<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> about her plan will garner her attention.
TEXT_LUCKZF202_03483_WOVENOATHKORILLE_000_020<tab>Ah, you are returned. Thank you again for your help at Woven Oath.
TEXT_LUCKZF202_03483_WOVENOATHKORILLE_000_021<tab>The murals were more beautiful than I dared imagine. And some much older.
TEXT_LUCKZF202_03483_WOVENOATHKORILLE_000_022<tab>I drew sketches of them that I could continue my studies here. If I should find anything of import, you will be the first to know.
TEXT_LUCKZF202_03483_WOVENOATHKORILLE_000_023<tab>But before that, I must first go and apologize to Korille.
